article_title: Scott Pruitt: ObamaCare's Next Legal Challenge
article_text:
Oklahoma City

As millions of Americans see their health-insurance premiums increase, have their coverage dropped as a result of the Affordable Care Act, and are unable to use the federal exchange, Oklahoma has sued the Obama administration. The Sooner State and several others are trying to stop the government from imposing tax penalties on certain states, businesses and individuals in defiance of the law. If these legal challenges...

twitter.description: In The Wall Street Journal, Oklahoma Attorney General Scott Pruitt writes that the Affordable Care Act is clear: Insurance subsidies can only go through state-run exchanges.
twitter.title: ObamaCare's Next Legal Challenge
